content: {"name": "LIFE BRIDGE INNER CITY MINISTRY", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Grocery Assistance Monday - Thursday once a month by calling (912)236-9090 \n\nhttps://www.facebook.com/lifebridgeinnercityministry", "email": "", "url": "https://www.lifebridgeinnercity.org/weekly-ministries.html", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "704 Wheaton Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Hitch Village/Fred Wessels Homes", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "31401", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 32.0721536, "longitude": -81.0828092}, "phones": [{"number": "(912) 236-9090", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}]}
